Entries.Mon10: Do you ever feel like the whole world is scrutinising you like some disgusting insect?
Entries.Tue8: We should go to a Tunnellers game some time. When I go by myself, I usually drink way too much beer.
Entries.Sun4: Hmm... it's %time. Should I throw a frozen pizza in the microwave, or should I wait?$u||If the Tunnellers win, I'll knock back a cold one to celebrate.#$e#If they lose? I'll have a cold one to drown my sorrows.
Entries.Sun8: If I watch more telly, maybe I can forget about life. That would be relaxing.$u
